医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的成像协议增强了稀有骨髓细胞的可视化骨髓在维持造血干细胞和骨稳态方面发挥着至关重要的作用。然而，由于缺乏有效的标记物和单克隆抗体来准确识别罕见的 LepR+ 基质细胞，研究受到阻碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/New-imaging-protocol-enhances-visualization-of-rare-bone-marrow-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/New-imaging-protocol-enhances-visualization-of-rare-bone-marrow-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ff310ef-f513-4ae7-8242-da838ea4d05f Tue, 21 Jan 2025 07:31:03 -0500 New imaging protocol enhances visualization of rare bone marrow cells
全球公众对科学的信任保持稳定尽管对科学家的信任程度较低，但一项研究指出了对开放性和研究优先事项的担忧，强调需要更好的科学交流。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Public-trust-in-science-holds-steady-globally.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Public-trust-in-science-holds-steady-globally.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec58bded-4728-474d-940a-366a619347ca Tue, 21 Jan 2025 06:37:00 -0500 Public trust in science holds steady globally
研究表明增加草甘膦接触会对婴儿健康产生有害影响俄勒冈大学两位经济学家的一项新研究表明，草甘膦是美国和世界大部分地区使用最广泛的除草剂之一，增加接触草甘膦会损害美国农业县的婴儿健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Study-links-increased-glyphosate-exposure-to-harmful-effects-on-infant-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Study-links-increased-glyphosate-exposure-to-harmful-effects-on-infant-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=714066f6-3ca4-4e5c-a256-23e0320ddf65 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 06:24:02 -0500 Study links increased glyphosate exposure to harmful effects on infant health
新的基于尿液的试剂盒有望在家中准确诊断膀胱癌膀胱癌早期发现的治愈率超过90%，但复发率高达70%，需要持续监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/New-urine-based-kit-promises-accurate-bladder-cancer-diagnosis-at-home.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/New-urine-based-kit-promises-accurate-bladder-cancer-diagnosis-at-home.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f00d11c-21d8-49c3-b42a-dafd2a5ca1e3 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 05:54:44 -0500 New urine-based kit promises accurate bladder cancer diagnosis at home
基于生活方式的干预措施如何帮助管理多囊卵巢综合症研究表明，生活方式的改变可以缓解多囊卵巢综合症的症状，通过饮食和身体活动改善胰岛素抵抗和荷尔蒙平衡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/How-lifestyle-based-interventions-help-manage-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/How-lifestyle-based-interventions-help-manage-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3c40b7d-3d28-49d2-ac95-570a93529833 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 05:38:00 -0500 How lifestyle-based interventions help manage PCOS
阿兹夫定在减少 COVID-19 死亡方面优于帕克洛维德在住院的 COVID-19 患者中，azvudine 显示出比 Paxlovid 更低的全因死亡率和更少的不良事件，并且观察到了额外的抗肿瘤作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Azvudine-beats-paxlovid-in-reducing-COVID-19-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Azvudine-beats-paxlovid-in-reducing-COVID-19-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2746778-bda6-4f85-8be4-c852cbbd0c00 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 04:50:00 -0500 Azvudine beats paxlovid in reducing COVID-19 deaths
卡路里标签略有减少摄入量，但酒精影响尚不清楚食物上的卡路里标签可能会降低卡路里摄入量，但关于酒精的研究结果尚无定论，这表明有效公共卫生策略的研究存在差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Calorie-labels-cut-intake-slightly-but-alcohol-impact-unclear.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Calorie-labels-cut-intake-slightly-but-alcohol-impact-unclear.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3db30eb2-9334-4e59-a61e-1dae37629652 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 04:10:00 -0500 Calorie labels cut intake slightly, but alcohol impact unclear

是什么导致痤疮复发？新研究探讨异维A酸的结果新研究表明，增加异维A酸累积剂量可以显着减少痤疮复发和重新治疗的需要，为长期皮肤洁净带来希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/What-drives-acne-relapse-New-study-explores-isotretinoin-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/What-drives-acne-relapse-New-study-explores-isotretinoin-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1420395a-a8c9-475d-93e4-4bdb16f10b3c Mon, 20 Jan 2025 22:39:00 -0500 What drives acne relapse? New study explores isotretinoin outcomes
认识万达：人工智能生成的影响者传播癌症预防信息人工智能产生的影响者可以以低成本在社交媒体上有效传播癌症预防信息，为公共卫生活动提供可扩展的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Meet-Wanda-The-AI- generated-influencer-spreading-cancer-prevention-messages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Meet-Wanda-The-AI- generated-influencer-spreading-cancer-prevention-messages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e87f6fec-e042-4528-84c5-eb05c2911649 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 20:38:00 -0500 Meet Wanda: The AI-generated influencer spreading cancer prevention messages
